# F# Language

> The F# programming languageâ€”a functional-first language for .NET. Covers F# syntax, type providers, computation expressions, and functional programming patterns. Integrates seamlessly with the .NET ecosystem.

- [F# language strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/strategy.md): We will drive F# evolution and support the F# ecosystem with language leadership and governance. We will encourage community contributions to improve the F# language and developer experience.
- [Tour of F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tour.md): Examine some of the key features of the F# programming language in this tour with code samples.
- [What is F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/what-is-fsharp.md): Learn about what the F# programming language is and what F# programming is like. Learn about rich types, functions, and how they fit together.

## Subtopics

- [Get Started with F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/get-started/llms.txt): 5 topics; F# setup with Visual Studio, VS Code, or .NET CLI.
- [F# Language Reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/llms.txt): 71 topics, 119 in tree; F# syntax: types, functions, pattern matching, and computation expressions.
- [Scenarios Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/scenarios/llms.txt): 2 topics; Scenarios Docs documentation and reference.
- [F# Style Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/style-guide/llms.txt): 4 topics; Idiomatic F# conventions, formatting, and naming.
- [Tools Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tools/llms.txt): 3 topics; Tools Docs documentation and reference.
- [F# Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tutorials/llms.txt): 3 topics; Hands-on F# tutorials from beginner to advanced.
- [Using F# On Azure Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/using-fsharp-on-azure/llms.txt): 6 topics; Using F# On Azure Docs documentation and reference.
- [What's New in F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/whats-new/llms.txt): 9 topics; New F# features by version.
